    • Uses of AuthorizationStack in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization

      Subclasses of AuthorizationStack in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthorizationPlugin
      This is a subclass of AuthorizationEntity and is a wrapper to a IAuthorizationPlugin delegating the decision methods to the contained plugin.

      Clones the stack.
